Entry.JapaneseText: クレアは、本当に この城にいるのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Is Claire really in this castle...?

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、陛下がヒューマの娘を集めるよう 指示を出されているのは間違いない。
Entry.EnglishText: But there's no doubt that it was on her Majesty's orders that the Huma girls were being assembled.

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下にうかがえば、クレアさんの居場所の 確実な情報も手にできると思うのだが……
Entry.EnglishText: If we were to ask her Majesty, I think we would be able to get reliable information on where Claire is, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……アガーテ……必ずクレアを 返してもらうぞ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Agarte... I'm going to get Claire back from you!
